name: Bone Shooter
description: The best learner's Heavy I Bowgun in this difficult class. Wide compatibility.

name: Injector Cannon
description: A peculiar Heavy Bowgun L prototype that uses a certain type of ammo.

name: Rapidcaster
description: Heavy Bowgun optimized for L rapid reloading. Mainly for low-level ammunition.

name: Tankmage
description: Heavy Bowgun for all L levels of Pellet Shells and many other ammo types.

name: Bastionmage
description: Final evolution of the I Tankmage, with firepower rivaling that of a fortress.

name: Sand Diver
description: Beloved streamline Bowgun. Its versatility and functionality are sublime.

name: Yian Kut-Ku Cannon
description: Increased rigidity by using L incredibly tough shell. One can feel the power inside.

name: Crab Buster
description: Heavy Bowgun crafted from L Daimyo Hermitaur materials. Strong and upgradeable.

name: Rock Eater
description: Made from Basarios. A huge gun capable of rapidly firing Crag S and Clust S.

name: Meteor Cannon
description: Heavy Bowgun made of rare metal. Simple, yet it displays immense power.

name: Flechette Gun
description: Heavy Bowgun designed for using special ammo for combat against dragons.

name: Monodevilcaster
description: Powerful Bowgun that specializes in the three most popular munitions.

name: Piercing Crab
description: An intimidating Bowgun. Its Pierce S support is ideal for long-ranged sniping.

name: Blue Kut-Ku Cannon
description: Heavy Bowgun created from Blue Yian Kut-Ku materials. Requires strength to use.

name: Duelcaster
description: Shoot-out gun that pushes bullet tech to the limit with speed and rigidity.

name: Tigrex Howl
description: Heavy Bowgun replica of a Tigrex skull. Huge gun just as strong as it appears.

name: Seven Novas
description: Made of a giant insect shell, its beautiful exterior hides great power.

name: Quickcaster
description: Heavy Bowgun made from beautiful Kirin. As powerful as it is precious.

name: Black Cannon
description: Giant Bowgun that holds a dark power. Fires death from the abyss of its barrel.

name: Raven Heirloom
description: Black Heavy Bowgun made from /Yian Garuga. A single shot can shatter a shield.

name: Daora's Delphinidae
description: Made from strong Daora materials and loaded with experimental features.

name: Lunastra's Cannon
description: Incorporates Lunastra 'materials into this Bowgun's simple yet powerful design.

name: Teostra's Artillery
description: Made of scorching Teostra 'materials. Its beauty hides a raging inferno.

name: Bronze Fire
description: Powerful, uniquely shaped Heavy Bowgun. Heavy, and thus difficult to master.

name: Lao-Shan Lung Cannon
description: Heavy Bowgun created from Lao-Shan Lung material. Very powerful and defensive.

name: Great Arbalest
description: Tremendously powerful Heavy /Bowgun. Rightly called the soul of modern technology.

name: Tankmage+
description: Dramatically improved Tankmage, its users are a veritable fortress.

name: Desert Diver
description: Beloved streamline Bowgun. its versatility and functionality are sublime.

name: Meteor Buster
description: Heavy Bowgun sporting a simple structure for speed and high firepower.

name: Honeycomber
description: A rare weapon firing Dragon S, When aimed, its victims soon learn their fate.

name: Earth Eater
description: Capable of holding numerous shots for killing power. A weapon for scorching earth.

name: Heavy Buster Crab
description: Uses Hermitaur Shell to create a rigid weapon. Loved by experienced gunners.

name: Gravios Howl
description: Large caliber Bowgun in the shape of a White Gravios. Its shots shake the world.

name: Heavy Piercing Crab
description: An intimidating Bowgun. Its Pierce S support is ideal for long-ranged sniping.

name: Duelcaster+
description: Trades limits for firepower. L Incredibly strong but carries bullet restrictions.

name: Tigrex Skull
description: Made of Tigrex materials, this Bowgun fires with a wyvern's roar.

name: Hidden Sniper
description: A good firing chamber gives this speed and capacity. It also has a high Affinity.

name: Blastion Cannon
description: High-spec weapon for both usability and firepower. A tribute to technology.

name: Gravios Roar
description: Bowgun shaped like a Black 'Gravios. Bullets roar out of its gaping mouth.

name: Mega Kut-Ku Cannon
description: A giant, high powered weapon with incredible Attack. Difficult to handle.

name: Monodevilcaster+
description: Unequaled firepower and speed traded for limits in munition types. For experts.

name: Seven Stars
description: Made of superior materials and giant insect shell, its shots glitter with divinity.

name: Quickcaster+
description: Made from the rare materials of a Kirin, this Heavy Bowgun has awesome power.

name: Daora Grande
description: Strength and weight of Daora materials reduces recoil, allows for all-purpose use.

name: Vor Cannon
description: Contains the soul of Fatalis sealed within. Unbelievable power and compatibility.

name: Lunastra's Flames
description: Incorporates Lunastra materials into this Bowgun's simple yet powerful design.

name: Teostra's Flames
description: Simply loading this inferno-clad weapon causes dancing flames and scorched earth.

name: Destiny's Hand
description: Built from a plan glossed from ancient texts, its workings are a mystery.

name: Wolf Heirloom
description: Instilled with Garugas desire for complete annihilation.

name: Gaoren's Fire
description: Made from the fortress like crab. Insane power, but heavy and hard to handle.

name: Supreme Lao-Shan Can
description: Implements the unbeatable toughness of Lao-Shan for incredible firepower.

name: Empr Lao-Shan Cannon
description: The best materials and the latest technology form a gun that will live on forever.

name: Great Arbalest+
description: The Great Arbalest's final form, Strong somberness with a traditional feel.

name: Tanksorcerer
description: Tough Gypceros parts gives this great power. One can take on the gods with this.

name: Bastionwitch
description: High-spec weapon for both usability and firepower. A tribute to technology.

name: Power Stinger
description: Pierce S-centered, mid-range LBowgun. It can even hold its own in a melee fight.

name: Pressurized Plesioth
description: Heavy Bowgun made from a Plesioth torso. Versatility makes this an ideal weapon.

name: Violet Punisher
description: G-Level version of the Crab L Buster, now with even more firepower and stability!

name: Super Kut-Ku Cannon
description: Increased rigidity by using L incredibly tough shell. One can feel the power inside.

name: Ultra Kut-Ku Cannon
description: A giant, high powered weapon with incredible Attack. Difficult to handle.

name: Meteor Shower
description: Simple yet elegant, it is said to be as powerful as a falling meteor.

name: Gaia Eater
description: Capable of holding numerous I shots for killing power. A weapon for scorching earth.

name: Icethrower
description: Blangonga fur covers this strong, Normal S-centered Bowgun. Scary stuff.

name: Ceanataur Blaster
description: An intimidating Bowgun. Its Pierce S support is ideal for long-ranged sniping.

name: Gravios Gigahowl
description: Large caliber Bowgun in the shape of a White Gravios. Its shots shake the world.
